thread.title: TUI buys destination services ops from Hotelbeds for 110 million euros

title: TUI buys destination services ops from Hotelbeds for 110 million euros
text:
March 28, 2018 / 7:31 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago TUI buys destination services ops from Hotelbeds for 110 million euros Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - Europe’s largest tour operator TUI ( TUIT.L ) said on Wednesday it was buying Spanish hotel room specialist Hotelbeds Group’s destination services business for 110 million euros (96.31 million pounds) in cash. The TUI logo is displayed on a computer screen in London, Britain, October 17, 2017. Picture taken on October 17, 2017. REUTERS/Hannah McKay 
The deal will allow it to expand in the destination services market, which develops and arranges excursions at holiday destinations and which is growing at a rate of around 7 percent a year, TUI said in a statement. Reporting by Maria Sheahan
